ComicInfo.Title: Cherry, Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary: The Teenage Kix bring the fight to the Boys' doorstep and learn immediately that they've taken on more than they can handle! The Boys are back in business, but is it all too much for Hughie to handle?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:19:13. [CVDB105912]
ComicInfo.Characters: A-Train, Adam Fleisher, Big Game, Black Noir, Blarney Cock, Butcher, Dogknott, Drummer Boy, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Gunpowder, Jack from Jupiter, Jamie, Jetstreak, Mother's Milk, Popclaw, Queen Maeve, Shout Out, Starlight, Terror, The Deep, The Homelander, Vic the Veep, Wee Hughie, Whack Job
ComicInfo.Teams: Central Intelligence Agency, New York Police Department, Teenage Kix, The Boys, The Seven, Young Americans
ComicInfo.Locations: Central Park, Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State
